TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TFBuffer.BufferReleaseFunc(IntPtr data, IntPtr lenght);
.class nested public auto ansi sealed TFBuffer/BufferReleaseFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Signature of the method that is invoked to release the data.
Docs.remarks: Methods of this signature are invoked with the data pointer and the lenght pointer when then TFBuffer no longer needs to hold on to the data.
